room_title: Escape room "The Pyramid" by Escape Room LA in Los Angeles
room_description: Set out on an expedition to a hidden jungle pyramid in search of The Mask of the Jade Warrior, a fabled lost treasure of the Maya. The mask is hidden in a secret tomb deep within the ancient pyramid. But to find it, you must solve the pyramidâ€™s perplexing puzzles, riddles and challenges. Will you find the jade mask and escape? Or will you be trapped inside forever?
